sentences.en: 'so you've been seduced by the witch! "
sentences.cn: “ 你给狐狸迷着了么? ”

sentences.en: A witch was supposed to take the shape of a cat.
sentences.cn: 据说女巫会化为猫的形状。

sentences.en: Are you a good witch or a bad witch?
sentences.cn: 你是个好巫婆,还是个坏巫婆?

sentences.en: Becuz they say she's a witch. "
sentences.cn: 因为人们说她是个巫婆. ”

sentences.en: He smells out plagiarism with the fury of a witch - doctor.
sentences.cn: 对于抄袭来的文章,他的嗅觉如巫医般敏感,且怒不可遏.

sentences.en: I have heard of one old witch changing herself into a pigeon.
sentences.cn: 我听说有个老巫婆把自己变成了一只鸽子.

sentences.en: She must be a witch.
sentences.cn: 她一定是个女巫。

sentences.en: She was swindled out of ￡ 1,000 by a witch.
sentences.cn: 她被一个女巫骗了一千英镑。

sentences.en: So the old witch was forced to dance a jigs.
sentences.cn: 老女巫也只好跳起快步舞来.

sentences.en: Some people believe that a witch can lay a ghost.
sentences.cn: 一些人相信女巫能驱鬼.

sentences.en: The heartless witch cast a spell on the poor little girl.
sentences.cn: 狠心的女巫对孤苦无助的小女孩施了妖术.

sentences.en: The little witch put a mock malignity into her beautiful eyes, and Joseph, trembling with sincere horror, hurried out praying and ejaculating " wicked " as he went.
sentences.cn: 这个小女巫那双美丽的眼睛里添上一种嘲弄的恶毒神气. 约瑟夫真的吓得直抖, 赶紧跑出去,一边跑一边祷告,还嚷着 “ 恶毒! ”

sentences.en: The old witch said she could raise the dead.
sentences.cn: 老巫婆说她能起死回生。

sentences.en: The skeleton frame of the witch shook beneath strong convulsions.
sentences.cn: 巫婆骨瘦如柴的躯体因猛烈的感情激动而震颤着.

sentences.en: The witch charmed the prince.
sentences.cn: 女巫使王子中了魔法.

sentences.en: The witch doctors were bedizened in all their gaudiest costumes.
sentences.cn: 女巫医穿上她们最绚丽的衣服,打扮得俗不可耐.

sentences.en: The witch hid her loathsome face with her hands.
sentences.cn: 巫婆用手掩住她那张令人恶心的脸.

sentences.en: The witch was hideously ugly.
sentences.cn: 那个女巫丑得吓人.

sentences.en: To be a witch is to live with the earth, not just on it.
sentences.cn: 作为一个女巫，意味着不仅仅是生活在大地之上，而是与其生活在一起。

sentences.en: Wilt thou tell her this, thou witch - baby? "
sentences.cn: 你把这话告诉她好吗, 你这小妖精? ”

phrases.phrase: as cold as (或 colder than) a witch's tit

trans.tran_en: a woman who is supposed to have magic powers, especially to do bad things
